message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $180 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $160. It's a fair price considering its unique features and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $152. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $152. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $140 again, but I'm willing to add a small concession. I'll throw in an additional service that's worth $10, so the total price would be $130 for the product and the service.

I appreciate the additional service you're offering, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $150. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway again. I'll offer you the product for $145, and I'll throw in the same service you're offering. The total price would be $155 for the product and the service.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $155 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product and the service, which is the same as my previous offer. I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
